tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dancer_profiles (
    dancer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    skills JSONB,
    experience JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE DancerProfiles (
    dancer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    bio TEXT,
    experience_years INT,
    skills TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DancerProfile (
    dancer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE DancerExperience (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dancer_id INT,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    company VARCHAR(100),
    years_active INT
);

CREATE TABLE ContactInfo (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    postal_code VARCHAR(15),
    dancer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (dancer_id) REFERENCES DancerProfiles(dancer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dancer_profiles (
	profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	full_name VARCHAR(255),
	email VARCHAR(255),
	phone_number VARCHAR(15),
	birthdate DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experience (
	exp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	exp_title VARCHAR(100),
	exp_description TEXT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);
